pages.text: Vony radyty vy pryblyzno psuyetʹsya viyny. Skazhitʹ, psuyetʹsya viyny nalezhte BOHU ta kur'yeru." Vy budete zauvazhyty BOHA, exhort odyn odnym shchob buty spravedlyvi, ta pidkoryayetesya BOHU ta Yoho kur'yeru, yakshcho vy viruyuchi
virni viruyuchi ye tsi chyyi serdenʹka dryzhatʹ koly BOH z·haduyetʹsya, ta koly Yoho vidkryttya deklamuyutʹsya yim, yikhnya vira posylyuyetʹsya, ta vony doviryayutʹ u yikhnʹomu Lordi
Vony zauvazhuyutʹ Kontaktni Molytvy (Salat), ta z nashykh umov yim, vony dayutʹ dobrodiynistʹ
Takyy yavlyayutʹ soboyu virnykh viruyuchiv. Vony dosyahayutʹ vysokykh ranhiv u yikhnʹomu Lordi, tak zhe, yak i forgiveness ta velykodushnomu zabezpechenni
Todi vash Lord willed shcho vy lyshayete vash dodomu, fulfill spetsyfichnyy plan, deyaki viruyuchi staly exposed yak vymusheni viruyuchi
Vony sperechalysya z vamy proty pravdy, navitʹ pislya vse buly roz'yasneni yim. Vony diyaly yak yakshcho vony velysʹ do pevnoyi smerti

Vidklykannya shcho BOH poobitsyav vam peremohu nad pevnoyu hrupoyu, ale vy dosi zakhotily zustrichatysya z bilʹsh slaboyu hrupoyu. Tse buv BOZHYY plan vstanovyty pravdu z Yoho slovamy, ta shchob zavdaty porazky disbelievers
Dlya Vin ukhvalyv shcho pravda bude perevazhaty, ta falsehood bude znyknuty, nezvazhayuchy na evildoers
